{{Quote|When you meet your gods, you tell them Shagga, son of Dolf, of the Stone Crows sent you.|[[Shagga]] to [[Tyrion Lannister]]|The Pointy End}}
'''Dolf''' is a character mentioned in the [[Season 1|first season]] episode "[[The Pointy End]]". He is a member of the [[Stone Crows]], one of the [[hill tribes]] of the [[Mountains of the Moon]] in the [[Vale of Arryn]]. He's the father of [[Shagga]], current leader of the Stone Crows.
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Dolf, father of Shagga, is a Stone Crow and the son of Holger.
